attributes.action: Give all teaching assistants a payrise after their sacrifice during Covid19.
attributes.additional_details: Teaching assistants are faced with more and more challenging behaviour and issues from students. Some are put at risk due to violent outbursts and aggressive behaviour. Their pay does not reflect the diverse skills now required to nurture, coach, encourage, counsel, support, guide and educate children and young adults with increasingly complex needs.
attributes.background: Give teaching assistants a pay rise in recognition for their hard work.
